description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical

study conditions: 1 refers to the condition shake baited-stir empty in the manuscript. 2 refers to the condition shake empty-stir baited. In condition 1 one cup is shaken producing and sound and the other is stirred. In condition 2 the empty cup is shaken producing no sound and the baited cup is stirred producing no sound as well. 3 refers to the control condition
the code refers to the manipulation of the left cup- which can be shaken_empty/ shaken_baited/ stirred_empty/ and stirred_baited
the code refers to the manipulation of the right cup-  which can be shaken_empty/ shaken_baited/ stirred_empty/ and stirred_baited
signals which cup the participant chose. 1 means left and 2 means right
signals whether the participant found the food and succeeded (1) or did not find the food and failed (0)
